name: SWTOR Caster
tagline: SWTOR ability logger for streamers using the combat log
body:
### Download

SWTOR Caster uses Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6. IF you're on Windows 8 or 10, you'll most likely already have this installed. However the setup should also take care of this for you.

## [Download latest release](http://pjmagee.synology.me/swtorcaster/publish.htm)

### Here are some reasons to give SWTOR Caster a try

* Add some character to your stream and stand out from the rest.
* Viewers can learn class rotation with being able to see the abilities you use and in what order.
* Great for PvP and to show off some of those skills.
* People might ask what your opener is on an enemy, but now they can see it clearly.
* You can hide the ability text for a minimalist look.
* Shows with most "activated" abilities (Medpacks, Mounting, Combat etc...)

### SWTOR Enable combat log

Be sure to enable the combat log file. SWTOR Caster reads this file like other third party DPS/HPS Parsers.

![Client Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pjmagee/swtor-caster/master/Screenshots/swtor-game-combat-logging-to-file.jpg)
